pkgmetadata.longdescription: Imbi API========The backend API for `Imbi <https://github.com/AWeber-Imbi/imbi>`_.|Version| |Coverage| |License|Contributing------------For information on contributing, including development environment setup, see`CONTRIBUTING.md <https://github.com/aweber/imbi/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md>`_.Etymology---------Imbi is Old High German for "Swarm of Bees".. |Version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/imbi.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/imbi.. |Coverage| image:: https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/aweber/imbi.svg :target: https://codecov.io/github/AWeber-Imbi/imbi-api?branch=master.. |License| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/imbi.svg? :target: https://imbi.readthedocs.org
